charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1101_0100_:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] stumbled
upon Trevor chatting with other Trainers.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_0300_:
Look at these flowers Florges and I have been
looking after!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_0401_0500_:
Right? Florges really knows how to take good care
of them!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_0800_:
Florges looks really energetic when she’s taking
care of flowers, huh?
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_0900_:
Ooh, you both have a great eye for detail,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], Elio.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_1000_: I agree, and I’m happy that you both noticed!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_1100_:
Florges actually gets its energy from
flowering plants.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_1200_:
And it’s said to devote its long life to protecting
the flower gardens it claims as its territory.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_1300_:
Cool! So that means Florges and the flowers are
helping each other out!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_1400_:
I did notice a lot of Flabébé at Melemele Meadow
back in Alola. Huh...it makes sense now.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_1500_:
I gotta say, you’ve been studying a lot, Trevor!
Well done!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_1600_:
Oh! Um... No, no—I still need to study a
lot more...
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_1700_:
But thank you, Professor Kukui, for your
kind words!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_1800_:
I’m also impressed, Trevor! You explained so well
about Florges—you’re just as smart as a
Rotom Dex!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_1900_: Wait...you’ve used a Rotom Dex before, Elio?!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_2000_:
Ah, I’m so jealous! I’ve only heard of it and have
never had the chance to get my hands on one!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_2100_:
Oh, right. Is the Rotom Dex somewhat difficult to
come by, Professor Kukui?
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_2200_:
Yeah, I’d say it’s pretty rare for a Trainer to
have one!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_2300_:
Oh, but I heard Clemont—a Gym Leader from
Kalos—was involved in developing it.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_2400_:
So, if you want to learn more about it, you should
reach out to him!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_2500_:
Oh, really? Sure, I’ll ask him the next time I
see him!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_2600_: The Rotom Dex is just amazing...
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_2700_:
Our tools and devices are updated day by day...
To put it another way, they evolve just like
Pokémon do.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_2800_:
Um...you know, someday I want to help update
a Pokédex.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_2900_:
So, I’ve been writing reports based on my
observations of Pokémon I meet on Pasio, hoping
to discover something new about them.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_3000_:
I’ve also been writing reports about the battles I
have with different sync pairs.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_0301_3100_: Wow, you’ve been researching a lot!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_0401_3200_: Hehe! Well, I just really like what I do!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_0302_3300_: I need to follow your example!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_0402_3400_:
Oh, well, actually, I always follow YOU as an
example, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_3500_:
Lately, I’ve been enjoying discovering new things
and meeting all kinds of Pokémon from different
regions.
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_3600_:
I want to deepen my learning on Pasio and know
even more about Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0181_00_trova/2301_1201_3700_:
so that I can build a stronger connection with
Florges as a sync pair!
